question.title: Will Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Ireland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Ireland set to make it to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if Ireland takes part in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a spot in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland fails to qualify, the inquiry will be deemed **No**.

question.title: Will Cyprus qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Cyprus participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Cyprus does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Cyprus not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Cyprus does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Cyprus qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Cyprus going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Cyprus takes part in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Conversely, if Cyprus fails to qualify, the outcome will be a **No**.

question.title: Will both Ireland and Cyprus qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (b) Cyprus participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Ireland or Cyprus does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will either Ireland or Cyprus not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following conditions is met: (a) Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Cyprus does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If both Ireland and Cyprus qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Are both Ireland and Cyprus set to advance to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if both of the following criteria are fulfilled: (a) Ireland competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (b) Cyprus competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the EBU as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Ireland or Cyprus fails to qualify, the inquiry will be considered **No**.

question.title: Will either Ireland or Cyprus qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either Ireland or Cyprus participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Ireland nor Cyprus qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Ireland nor Cyprus qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither Ireland nor Cyprus participates in a Semi-final or if both are officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as not having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Ireland or Cyprus qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that either Ireland or Cyprus will make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if either Ireland or Cyprus competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Conversely, if neither Ireland nor Cyprus secures qualification, the answer will be **No**.

question.title: Will there be another Democratic party presidential debate?
question.body: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will there be no Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is another presidential debate for the Democratic party expected?
para_P.body: Determines YES if a debate occurs among prospective Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Determines NO in all other cases.

question.title: Kamala president by Friday?
question.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

Resolver

not_P.title: Kamala not president by Friday?
not_P.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is not formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

Resolver

para_P.title: Will Kamala Harris assume the presidency by this Friday?
para_P.body:
This market will conclude with a "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time prior to July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. If this does not occur, the market will result in a "No".

The main source for resolution will be official announcements from the US government, but a consensus of reliable news reports will also be considered.

Resolver

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Democratic National Convention and (b) Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President before July 26, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

(b) Resolves YES if Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this resolves to NO.

The primary resolution source for (b) will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Democratic National Convention nor (b) Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President before July 26, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

(b) Resolves YES if Vice President Kamala Harris is never formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this resolves to NO.

The primary resolution source for (b) will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

para_P.title: Is it possible that both of the following events happen: (a) a subsequent Democratic party presidential debate takes place prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention and (b) Kamala Harris is appointed as President or Acting President before July 26, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This will be marked as YES if a debate occurs among potential Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It will be marked as NO if no such debate occurs.

(b) This will be marked as YES if Vice President Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. If not, it will be marked as NO.

The main source for determining (b) will be official announcements from the US government, although a consensus among reliable news reports will also be taken into account.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Democratic National Convention (b) Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President by July 26, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.
(b) This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Democratic National Convention (b) Kamala Harris does not become President or Acting President by July 26, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.
(b) This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is not formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following happens: (a) another presidential debate for the Democratic party takes place before the 2024 Democratic National Convention, or (b) Kamala Harris is appointed as President or Acting President by July 26, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This will be marked as YES if a debate occurs among potential Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It will be marked as NO otherwise.
(b) This market will be considered "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is officially named as President or Acting President of the United States at any time before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. If not, it will be marked as "No".

The main source for resolution will be official announcements from the US government, but a consensus from reliable news reports will also be taken into account.

question.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

not_P.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be less than or equal to 3 or greater than 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

para_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden be more than 3 but not exceeding 4 according to 538's national polling average?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will conclude based on the extent of Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden as indicated by 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) on the chart dated July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

In this context, a positive figure signifies a lead for Trump, whereas a negative figure indicates Biden is in the lead. For instance, on July 5, 2024, the reported value shows Trump ahead of Biden by 2.4 points, which translates to a positive value of 2.4 for the purposes of this question.

question.title: Will Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Vivek Ramaswamy not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is not selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Is Vivek Ramaswamy going to be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will result in a **No** resolution. This question is not limited to the current candidates listed; additional options may be introduced later.

For the purpose of this question, it does not matter who is awarded the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is exclusively based on who is chosen by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, and (b) Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
(a) This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. The lead must be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4.

(b) This question will resolve as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future. It is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following occur: (a) Trump's lead over Biden be less than or equal to 3 or greater than 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, or (b) Vivek Ramaswamy not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
(a) This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. The lead must be less than or equal to 3 or greater than 4.

(b) This question will resolve as **No** if Vivek Ramaswamy is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **Yes**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future. It is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Will both of the following take place: (a) the margin by which Trump is ahead of Biden exceeds 3 but does not surpass 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, and (b) Vivek Ramaswamy secures the Republican nomination for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
(a) This inquiry will be resolved based on the extent of Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as shown on the chart dated July 15, 2024, when it is reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive figure indicates a lead for Trump, while a negative figure signifies that Biden is in the lead. The advantage must be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4.

(b) This question will conclude with a **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will result in a **No**. This question is not limited to the candidates currently mentioned; other choices may be introduced later. It is ultimately determined by the nominees selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will either Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, or Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following conditions are met: 

(a) Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election is greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 points as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. For the purposes of this condition, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading.

(b) Vivek Ramaswamy is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This condition is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election.

not_P.title: Will neither Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, nor Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following conditions are met: 

(a) Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election is greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 points as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. For the purposes of this condition, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading.

(b) Vivek Ramaswamy is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This condition is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election.

para_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will Trump's advantage over Biden be more than 3 but not exceeding 4 according to 538's national polling average, or will Vivek Ramaswamy be chosen as the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if at least one of the following scenarios occurs: 

(a) The difference in polling between Donald Trump and Joe Biden in 538's national average for the 2024 presidential election exceeds 3 and is at most 4 points, as indicated on the chart for July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. In this context, a positive figure signifies a lead for Trump, while a negative figure indicates Biden is ahead.

(b) Vivek Ramaswamy is nominated by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This determination is based solely on the choice made by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, rather than who is announced as the Republican nominee on the date of the 2024 US election.

question.title: Will there be another Democratic party presidential debate?
question.body: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will there be no Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.body: Resolves YES if a debate occurs involving possible Democratic nominees (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO if no such debate takes place.

question.title: If Joe Biden drops out, will a reliable media outlet cover the story at least 6 hours in advance?
question.body:
Question resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post covers the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc.

Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will not be sufficient.

This market will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

not_P.title: If Joe Biden drops out, will a reliable media outlet not cover the story at least 6 hours in advance?
not_P.body:
Question resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post does not cover the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc.

Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will not be sufficient.

This market will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

para_P.title: Should Joe Biden decide to withdraw, will a credible news organization report the development at least 6 hours prior?
para_P.body:
This question will be considered TRUE if a major and trustworthy news organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post reports on the withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden makes his official announcement regarding the withdrawal through a letter, speech, etc.

Coverage by local news, conspiracy websites, or comments from individual users on Manifold will not be deemed adequate.

This market will be marked as N/A if President Joe Biden does not withdraw before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention.

question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

(b) Question resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post covers the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc. Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will not be sufficient. This market will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

(a) Resolves YES if there is a debate involving potential Democratic candidates (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO in other cases.

(b) This question resolves YES if a major and trustworthy media organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post reports on the withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours prior to President Joe Biden's official announcement of his withdrawal via letter, speech, etc. Coverage by local news, conspiracy websites, or comments from individual users on Manifold will not be adequate. This market will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not withdraw before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention.

question.title: Will Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that Israel will execute a lethal strike inside Iran prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if, after the date this question is posed and before May 1, 2024, reliable reports suggest that an assault linked to Israel, taking place within the territory of Iran, has resulted in the fatalities of no fewer than five people.

not_P.title: Will Croatia not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Croatia does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Otherwise, it will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Croatia set to make it to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Croatia takes part in a Semi-final and is subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. If not, the outcome will be **No**.

question.title: Will both the Netherlands and Croatia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both the Netherlands and Croatia participate in Semi-finals and are then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either the Netherlands or Croatia does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither the Netherlands nor Croatia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither the Netherlands nor Croatia participate in Semi-finals or are not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either the Netherlands or Croatia qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Are both the Netherlands and Croatia set to advance to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if both the Netherlands and Croatia take part in the Semi-finals and are subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. If either the Netherlands or Croatia fails to qualify, the inquiry will be deemed **No**.

question.title: Will either the Netherlands or Croatia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either the Netherlands or Croatia participates in a Semi-final and is then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither country qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither the Netherlands nor Croatia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither the Netherlands nor Croatia participates in a Semi-final or if both are officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as not having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either country qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will the Netherlands or Croatia make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if either the Netherlands or Croatia competes in a Semi-final and is subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a spot in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If both nations fail to qualify, the answer will be **No**.

question.title: Will the Republicans Party of France (Les Républicains) form a political alliance with the National Rally for the 2024 French legislative election?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if before June 30, 2024, an electoral alliance or coalition agreement is officially announced between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and National Rally (Rassemblement National) for the upcoming [French legislative election](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_French_legislative_election), according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).  If no such agreement is announced, this question resolves as **No**.

not_P.title: Will the Republicans Party of France (Les Républicains) not form a political alliance with the National Rally for the 2024 French legislative election?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if before June 30, 2024, no electoral alliance or coalition agreement is officially announced between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and National Rally (Rassemblement National) for the upcoming [French legislative election](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_French_legislative_election), according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions). If such an agreement is announced, this question resolves as **No**.

para_P.title: Are the Republicans Party of France (Les Républicains) going to establish a political coalition with the National Rally for the 2024 French legislative election?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if, prior to June 30, 2024, an official announcement of an electoral coalition or agreement is made between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and the National Rally (Rassemblement National) concerning the forthcoming [French legislative election](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_French_legislative_election), based on [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions). If such an agreement is not announced, the question will be resolved as **No**.

question.title: Will the Prime Minister of France belong to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as Yes if the party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

not_P.title: Will the Prime Minister of France not belong to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as Yes if the party of the Prime Minister of France is New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

para_P.title: On July 30, 2024, will the French Prime Minister be affiliated with a political coalition that is neither New Popular Front nor Together?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered in the affirmative if the political party of the French Prime Minister is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 PM Central European Time, based on reliable sources.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) The Republicans Party of France (Les Républicains) forms a political alliance with the National Rally for the 2024 French legislative election (b) The Prime Minister of France belongs to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
question.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met:

1. Before June 30, 2024, an electoral alliance or coalition agreement is officially announced between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and National Rally (Rassemblement National) for the upcoming French legislative election, according to credible sources. If no such agreement is announced, this part resolves as **No**.

2. The party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources. If the Prime Minister belongs to either of these coalitions, this part resolves as **No**.

The final resolution of this question is **Yes** only if both conditions are satisfied; otherwise, it resolves as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) The Republicans Party of France (Les Républicains) forms a political alliance with the National Rally for the 2024 French legislative election (b) The Prime Minister of France belongs to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
not_P.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if neither of the following conditions are met:

1. Before June 30, 2024, an electoral alliance or coalition agreement is officially announced between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and National Rally (Rassemblement National) for the upcoming French legislative election, according to credible sources. If such an agreement is announced, this part resolves as **Yes**.

2. The party of the Prime Minister of France is New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources. If the Prime Minister belongs to neither of these coalitions, this part resolves as **Yes**.

The final resolution of this question is **Yes** only if neither condition is satisfied; otherwise, it resolves as **No**.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will happen: (a) The French Republicans Party (Les Républicains) will create a political partnership with the National Rally for the 2024 legislative elections in France (b) The current Prime Minister of France will be part of a coalition that is neither New Popular Front nor Together on July 30, 2024?
para_P.body:
This question will be answered as **Yes** if both of the following criteria are fulfilled:

1. By June 30, 2024, there is an official announcement of an electoral partnership or coalition agreement between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and the National Rally (Rassemblement National) for the forthcoming French legislative elections, as reported by reliable sources. If such an agreement is not announced, this part will be answered as **No**.

2. The political party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to trustworthy sources. If the Prime Minister is affiliated with either of these coalitions, this part will be answered as **No**.

The overall resolution of this question will be **Yes** only if both criteria are met; otherwise, it will be answered as **No**.

question.title: Will either of the following occur by mid-2024: (a) The Republicans Party of France forms a political alliance with the National Rally for the 2024 French legislative election, or (b) The Prime Minister of France belongs to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Before June 30, 2024, an electoral alliance or coalition agreement is officially announced between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and National Rally (Rassemblement National) for the upcoming French legislative election, according to credible sources. If no such agreement is announced, this part resolves as **No**. (b) The party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources. If the Prime Minister belongs to either New Popular Front or Together, this part resolves as **No**. If either part resolves as **Yes**, the combined question resolves as **Yes**.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur by mid-2024: (a) The Republicans Party of France forms a political alliance with the National Rally for the 2024 French legislative election, nor (b) The Prime Minister of France belongs to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) Before June 30, 2024, an electoral alliance or coalition agreement is officially announced between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and National Rally (Rassemblement National) for the upcoming French legislative election, according to credible sources. If such an agreement is announced, this part resolves as **Yes**. (b) The party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources. If the Prime Minister belongs to either New Popular Front or Together, this part resolves as **Yes**. If neither part resolves as **No**, the combined question resolves as **No**.

para_P.title: Is it possible that by mid-2024, either (a) the Republicans Party of France will establish a political partnership with the National Rally for the 2024 French legislative elections, or (b) the Prime Minister of France will be part of a coalition that is neither New Popular Front nor Together on July 30, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered resolved as **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is met: (a) An official announcement of an electoral alliance or coalition agreement between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and National Rally (Rassemblement National) for the forthcoming French legislative election is made before June 30, 2024, as reported by reliable sources. If such an agreement is not announced, this part will resolve as **No**. (b) The Prime Minister of France does not belong to the New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, based on credible sources. If the Prime Minister is affiliated with either New Popular Front or Together, this part will resolve as **No**. If either part resolves as **Yes**, the overall question will resolve as **Yes**.

question.title: Will Ted Cruz be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ted Cruz is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Ted Cruz not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ted Cruz is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is not selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Is Ted Cruz going to be the chosen candidate for the Republican Party in the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if Ted Cruz is appointed by the Republican National Convention as their candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will result in a **No**. This question is not limited to the candidates listed below; additional candidates may be introduced in the future.

For the purpose of this question, it does not matter who is nominated by the Republican Party on the day of the 2024 US election; the determination is based solely on who is chosen by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democra...nomination for President?
question.body:
Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle.

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

question.title: Will either Ted Cruz be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election or Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (1) Ted Cruz is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention), not by who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election. (2) Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If neither of these events occurs, this question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Ted Cruz be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election nor Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (1) Ted Cruz is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention), not by who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If either of these events occurs, this question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Ted Cruz becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, or that Joe Biden publicly declares by July 15, 2024, that he will not pursue the Democratic nomination for President?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if at least one of the following takes place: (1) Ted Cruz is chosen by the delegates at the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This decision is made by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention), rather than the individual who is announced as the Republican nominee on the day of the 2024 US election. (2) Joe Biden or his campaign issues a clear, public, official statement before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, indicating that he will not seek nor accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. The announcement must be straightforward and definitive, eliminating any possibility that Biden would agree to accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 election cycle. If neither of these scenarios occurs, this question will be answered with **No**.

question.title: Will Kamala Harris’ VP Pick be Kelly or Shapiro (YES), or neither of them (NO)?
question.body:
The two favorites for Kamala’s running mate are currently Mark Kelly and Josh Shapiro. It is reported, Kamala will choose before August 7th.

This market resolves YES if/when Kamala Harris announces her pick for running mate being either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro.

This market resolves NO if/when Kamala Harris announces anyone else being her running mate.

I will wait until the pick is confirmed by Kamala herself to resolve this.

comment if you have any questions or news 💙

question.title: Will Chris Christie be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Chris Christie is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently mentioned; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

not_P.title: Will Chris Christie not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Chris Christie is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently mentioned; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

question.title: Will Biden drop out before 7/13?
question.body: If Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue his run as president before midnight July 13 Central Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to NO.

not_P.title: Will Biden not drop out before 7/13?
not_P.body: If Biden does not drop out and is able to continue his run as president before midnight July 13 Central Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to NO.

para_P.body: Should Biden decide to withdraw or be unable to pursue his presidential campaign before midnight on July 13 Central Time, this market will conclude with a yes. If not, it will result in a NO.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Chris Christie be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election? (b) Biden drop out before 7/13?
question.body:
(a) Chris Christie will be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election if he is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee. This is not dependent on who is the nominee on the day of the 2024 US election, but solely on the selection by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

(b) Biden will be considered to have dropped out if he drops out or is otherwise unable to continue his run as president before midnight July 13 Central Time. If neither of these conditions are met, this part will resolve to NO.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that (a) Chris Christie becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election? (b) Biden withdraws from the race prior to July 13?

This determination is based solely on the choice made by the delegates at the Republican National Convention and is not influenced by who is the nominee on the date of the 2024 US election.

(b) Biden will be deemed to have withdrawn if he either drops out or is otherwise unable to pursue his presidential campaign before midnight on July 13 Central Time. If neither of these scenarios occurs, this aspect will conclude with a NO.

question.title: Facing Joe Biden instead of a generic Democrat, will Trump gain at least 3% among Manifold respondents?
question.body:
There are two Manifold polls posted, which both close on July 6.  One of the polls asks Manifold respondents to vote with Joe Biden on a hypothetical ballot, and another asks respondents to vote with a generic Democrat on the hypothetical ballot.

@/SteveSokolowski/1-of-2-given-these-choices-who-woul@/SteveSokolowski/2-of-2-given-these-choices-who-woul 

Public opinion polls consistently show Joe Biden losing to Donald Trump outside the margin of error, but every other Democrat hypothetically surveyed polls ahead or within the margin of error.  Are Manifold respondents representative of the general public?

This market will resolve YES if the percentage of votes for Donald Trump in poll 1 exceeds that in poll 2 by 3% or more when both polls close.

The formula for determining the percentage of votes for Trump is (Trump / (Trump + (the Democrat in the question) + Someone else)).  The answer is YES if this formula for poll 1 - the formula for poll 2 >= 0.03.  Otherwise, it is NO.

The polls and this question will never resolve N/A, and will remain open until the close time no matter what.

not_P.body:

The formula for determining the percentage of votes for Trump is (Trump / (Trump + (the Democrat in the question) + Someone else)).  The answer is YES if this formula for poll 1 - the formula for poll 2 < 0.03.  Otherwise, it is NO.

The polls and this question will never resolve N/A, and will remain open until the close time no matter what.

para_P.title: If presented with Joe Biden rather than an unnamed Democrat, will Trump achieve at least a 3% increase among Manifold participants?
para_P.body:
Two polls conducted by Manifold are set to close on July 6. One poll requests Manifold participants to vote with Joe Biden on a hypothetical ballot, while the other asks them to vote with an unnamed Democrat on a similar ballot.

Public opinion surveys frequently indicate that Joe Biden trails Donald Trump beyond the margin of error, whereas all other Democrats surveyed hypothetically are either ahead or within the margin of error. Do Manifold participants reflect the views of the general populace?

This market will conclude with a YES if Donald Trump's vote percentage in the first poll surpasses that of the second poll by 3% or greater when both polls close.

To calculate the percentage of votes for Trump, use the formula (Trump / (Trump + (the Democrat in the question) + Someone else)). The outcome is YES if the calculation for poll 1 minus the calculation for poll 2 is greater than or equal to 0.03. If not, the outcome is NO.

The polls and this inquiry will never resolve as N/A, and will stay open until the specified closing time regardless of circumstances.

question.title: Will Donald Trump testify at the hush money trial?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report Donald Trump has testified, whether in person or remotely, at the [trial](https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcrim_attorney/Detail?which=case&docketNumber=q23XFOwZRDQ1d4LrNRdw2clqCMt/CzUoG/kRII/7Nmg=&countyId=K4i18rFVPQh5HTQ/kUoO3Q==&docketId=3Y4iKU5oHM75AtDme2cPhw==&docketDseq=T/O1YN_PLUS_BG65HkOeqEnpAkw==&defendantName=TRUMP,+DONALD&court=New+York+Supreme+Criminal+Court&courtType=U&recordType=U&recordNum=) concerning the so-called "hush money" payments to Stormy Daniels.

not_P.title: Will Donald Trump not testify at the hush money trial?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report Donald Trump has not testified, whether in person or remotely, at the [trial](https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcrim_attorney/Detail?which=case&docketNumber=q23XFOwZRDQ1d4LrNRdw2clqCMt/CzUoG/kRII/7Nmg=&countyId=K4i18rFVPQh5HTQ/kUoO3Q==&docketId=3Y4iKU5oHM75AtDme2cPhw==&docketDseq=T/O1YN_PLUS_BG65HkOeqEnpAkw==&defendantName=TRUMP,+DONALD&court=New+York+Supreme+Criminal+Court&courtType=U&recordType=U&recordNum=) concerning the so-called "hush money" payments to Stormy Daniels.

para_P.title: Will Donald Trump take the stand during the hush money trial?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) indicate that Donald Trump has given testimony, either in person or virtually, at the [trial](https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcrim_attorney/Detail?which=case&docketNumber=q23XFOwZRDQ1d4LrNRdw2clqCMt/CzUoG/kRII/7Nmg=&countyId=K4i18rFVPQh5HTQ/kUoO3Q==&docketId=3Y4iKU5oHM75AtDme2cPhw==&docketDseq=T/O1YN_PLUS_BG65HkOeqEnpAkw==&defendantName=TRUMP,+DONALD&court=New+York+Supreme+Criminal+Court&courtType=U&recordType=U&recordNum=) related to the alleged "hush money" payments made to Stormy Daniels.

question.title: Will the Month-over-Month US Core CPI increase by more than 0.1% in July?
question.body:
Resolves YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024.

The Data for resolution will be https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

not_P.title: Will the Month-over-Month US Core CPI not increase by more than 0.1% in July?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 does not increase by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024.

The Data for resolution will be https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that the Core CPI in the US will rise by over 0.1% from June to July?
para_P.body:
This will be considered a YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 shows an increase greater than 0.1% compared to its value in June 2024.

The data for this determination will be sourced from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL, and the precise (not rounded) figure will be used.

question.title: Will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
question.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office

not_P.title: Will Biden not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland not to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

para_P.title: Will Biden be recognized as incapacitated according to Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August?
para_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President alongside a majority of the Cabinet (or another pertinent body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his office" and allows the Vice President to act as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is irrelevant to this question.

Biden leaving the Presidency due to death, resignation, etc., is not considered. Biden's invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also not considered.

Context: A GOP lawmaker requests Merrick Garland to apply the 25th Amendment to remove Biden from the presidency.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) The Month-over-Month US Core CPI increase by more than 0.1% in July 2024, and (b) Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024. The data for resolution will be https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

(b) Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question. Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count. Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) The Month-over-Month US Core CPI increase by more than 0.1% in July 2024, nor (b) Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 does not increase by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024. The data for resolution will be https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

(b) Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question. Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count. Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

para_P.title: Is it possible for both of the following to take place: (a) The Core CPI in the US rises by over 0.1% from June to July 2024, and (b) Biden is officially deemed incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) Resolves to YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 shows an increase exceeding 0.1% when compared to June 2024. The resolution will reference the data available at https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will utilize the precise (not rounded) figure.

(b) Resolves to YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate entity) activates Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his office" and allows the Vice President to act as President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The length of the incapacity is irrelevant to this inquiry. Biden's departure from the presidency due to death, resignation, etc., is not applicable. Biden's invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also not applicable. Context: A GOP lawmaker has requested Merrick Garland to invoke the 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

question.title: Will either the US Core CPI increase by more than 0.1% in July or Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
question.body: This resolves YES if either of the following occurs: (a) The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024, using the exact (not rounded) value from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL. (b) The Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter, and Biden exiting the office by death, resignation, etc., or invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

not_P.title: Will neither the US Core CPI increase by more than 0.1% in July nor Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
not_P.body: This resolves YES if neither of the following occurs: (a) The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024, using the exact (not rounded) value from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL. (b) The Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter, and Biden exiting the office by death, resignation, etc., or invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that the US Core CPI will rise by over 0.1% in July or that Biden will be recognized as incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment before August?
para_P.body: This will be considered a YES if either of the following happens: (a) The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 shows an increase greater than 0.1% from June 2024, based on the precise (not rounded) figure from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL. (b) The Vice President, along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate body), invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to perform the powers and duties of his office" and allows the Vice President to act as President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The length of the incapacity is irrelevant, and Biden leaving office due to death, resignation, etc., or the invocation of section 3 of the 25th amendment does not apply.

question.title: Will Poland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Poland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Poland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Poland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Poland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Poland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Poland going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if Poland takes part in a Semi-final and is formally declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Conversely, if Poland fails to qualify, the response will be **No**.

question.title: Will Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Ireland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Ireland going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if Ireland competes in a Semi-final and is formally declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having progressed to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Conversely, if Ireland fails to qualify, the question will be resolved as **No**.

question.title: Will both Poland and Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both Poland and Ireland participate in a Semi-final and are officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Poland or Ireland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will either Poland or Ireland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either Poland or Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If both Poland and Ireland qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Are Poland and Ireland going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if both Poland and Ireland take part in a Semi-final and are officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured their places in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Poland or Ireland fails to qualify, the response will be **No**.

question.title: Will either Poland or Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Poland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Poland nor Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Poland nor Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) Poland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Poland or Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will Poland or Ireland make it to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if either of these conditions is met: (a) Poland competes in a Semi-final and is confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Ireland competes in a Semi-final and is confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Poland nor Ireland advances, the answer will be **No**.
