para_P.title: Will BOTH of these events take place: (1) Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) recommends that Tesla shareholders oppose Elon Musk's $57 billion compensation package or the re-election of Kimbal Musk AND (2) Donald Trump Jr. becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if BOTH of the following criteria are satisfied: (1) Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) issues a statement clearly advising Tesla shareholders to vote *against* either Elon Musk's remuneration package at the 2024 Tesla shareholder assembly OR the re-election of Kimbal Musk to the Tesla board of directors, AND (2) Donald Trump Jr. is nominated by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If either or both of these criteria are not fulfilled, the inquiry will be resolved as **No**.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) ISS advises against Elon Musk's package or Kimbal Musk's re-election, or (b) Donald Trump Jr. becomes the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) releases a statement explicitly advising Tesla shareholders to vote against Elon Musk's $57 billion pay package at the 2024 Tesla shareholder meeting or the re-election of Kimbal Musk to the Tesla board of directors, or (b) Donald Trump Jr. is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If neither event occurs, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) ISS advises against Elon Musk's package or Kimbal Musk's re-election, nor (b) Donald Trump Jr. becomes the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) releases a statement explicitly advising Tesla shareholders to vote against Elon Musk's $57 billion pay package at the 2024 Tesla shareholder meeting or the re-election of Kimbal Musk to the Tesla board of directors, nor (b) Donald Trump Jr. is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If either event occurs, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is it possible that either (a) ISS recommends rejecting Elon Musk's compensation package or Kimbal Musk's re-election, or (b) Donald Trump Jr. becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body: This question will be answered with **Yes** if at least one of the following takes place: (a) Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) issues a statement clearly advising Tesla shareholders to oppose Elon Musk's $57 billion pay package during the 2024 Tesla shareholder meeting or to oppose Kimbal Musk's re-election to the Tesla board of directors, or (b) Donald Trump Jr. is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If neither of these situations occurs, the question will be answered with **No**.

question.title: Kamala president by Friday?
question.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

Resolver

not_P.title: Kamala not president by Friday?
not_P.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is not formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

Resolver

para_P.title: Will Kamala Harris be President by Friday?
para_P.body:
This market will conclude with a "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time prior to July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. If not, the market will result in a "No".

The main source for resolving this market will be official announcements from the US government, but a collective agreement of reliable news reports will also be taken into account.

Resolver

question.title: Will Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body: The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

not_P.title: Will Donald Trump not be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
not_P.body: The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is not charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that Donald Trump will face charges for witness tampering in Georgia prior to June 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will resolve as **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted concerning any remarks linked to possible witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President of the United States before July 26, 2024, and (b) Donald Trump is charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body:
(a) This question will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source will be official information from the US government, but a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

(b) This question resolves to "Yes" if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President of the United States before July 26, 2024, nor (b) Donald Trump is charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) This question will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is not formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source will be official information from the US government, but a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

(b) This question resolves to "Yes" if Donald Trump is not charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must not occur before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is it possible that the following two events take place: (a) Kamala Harris is appointed as President or Acting President of the United States prior to July 26, 2024, and (b) Donald Trump faces charges for witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This inquiry will be answered with "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The main source for resolution will be official announcements from the US government, along with a consensus from reliable news reports.

(b) This inquiry will be answered with "Yes" if Donald Trump is charged or indicted regarding any remarks related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will either Kamala Harris become president by July 26, 2024, or Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve to "Yes" if either of the following occurs: (a) Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source for this will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used. (b) Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

not_P.title: Will neither Kamala Harris become president by July 26, 2024, nor Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve to "Yes" if neither of the following occurs: (a) Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source for this will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used. (b) Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Kamala Harris will take on the role of president by July 26, 2024, or that Donald Trump will face charges for witness tampering in Georgia prior to June 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed "Yes" if at least one of the following happens: (a) Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The main source for resolution will be official announcements from the US government, although a consensus of reliable news reporting will also be considered. (b) Donald Trump is charged or indicted regarding any remarks related to possible witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will the Crimean Bridge be hit with an attack before July 1, 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if, after May 2, 2024, and before the listed date, [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge.

not_P.title: Will the Crimean Bridge not be hit with an attack before July 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if, after May 2, 2024, and before the listed date, there are no [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) reporting that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that the Crimean Bridge will experience an attack prior to July 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if, following May 2, 2024, and before the specified date, [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) indicate that the Crimean Bridge has been targeted with gunfire, explosives, or projectiles that could significantly threaten the structural integrity of the bridge.

question.title: Will Joe Biden still be president by the end of July?
question.body: This market will resolve yes if at 11:59 pm on July 31st 2024 if Joe Biden is still officially president of the United States.

not_P.title: Will Joe Biden no longer be president by the end of July?
not_P.body: This market will resolve yes if at 11:59 pm on July 31st 2024 if Joe Biden is no longer officially president of the United States.

para_P.title: Will Joe Biden remain in the presidency until the conclusion of July?
para_P.body: This market will determine a yes outcome if at 11:59 pm on July 31st 2024 Joe Biden is still the officially recognized president of the United States.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) The Crimean Bridge is hit with an attack before July 1, 2024, and (b) Joe Biden is still president by the end of July 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (1) After May 2, 2024, and before July 1, 2024, [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge. (2) At 11:59 pm on July 31st, 2024, Joe Biden is still officially president of the United States.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) The Crimean Bridge is hit with an attack before July 1, 2024, nor (b) Joe Biden is still president by the end of July 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following conditions are met: (1) After May 2, 2024, and before July 1, 2024, [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge. (2) At 11:59 pm on July 31st, 2024, Joe Biden is not officially president of the United States.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will happen: (a) An attack will strike the Crimean Bridge prior to July 1, 2024, and (b) Joe Biden remains in office as president by the conclusion of July 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if both of the subsequent criteria are satisfied: (1) Between May 2, 2024, and July 1, 2024, [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) confirm that the Crimean Bridge has been impacted by gunfire, explosives, or projectiles that could significantly threaten the structural integrity of the bridge. (2) At 11:59 pm on July 31st, 2024, Joe Biden is still the official president of the United States.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) the Crimean Bridge be hit with an attack before July 1, 2024, or (b) Joe Biden still be president by the end of July 2024?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs:

(a) After May 2, 2024, and before July 1, 2024, [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge.

(b) At 11:59 pm on July 31st, 2024, Joe Biden is still officially president of the United States.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) the Crimean Bridge be hit with an attack before July 1, 2024, nor (b) Joe Biden still be president by the end of July 2024?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs:

(a) After May 2, 2024, and before July 1, 2024, [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge.

(b) At 11:59 pm on July 31st, 2024, Joe Biden is still officially president of the United States.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that one of the following will happen: (a) the Crimean Bridge will experience an attack before July 1, 2024, or (b) Joe Biden remains president until the end of July 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if either of the subsequent situations occurs:

(a) Between May 2, 2024, and July 1, 2024, [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) confirm that the Crimean Bridge has been targeted by gunfire, explosives, or projectiles that could significantly threaten the structure's integrity.

(b) As of 11:59 pm on July 31, 2024, Joe Biden is still the official president of the United States.

question.title: Will Joe Biden announce that he is both dropping out and resigning from the presidency before the end of July?
question.body:
Resolves YES if Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this market.

Otherwise, this market resolves NO on August 1st.

not_P.title: Will Joe Biden announce that he is neither dropping out nor resigning from the presidency before the end of July?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if Joe Biden does not announce both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this market.

Otherwise, this market resolves NO on August 1st.

para_P.title: Will Joe Biden declare his intention to both withdraw from the race and step down from the presidency prior to the conclusion of July?
para_P.body:
Resolves YES if Joe Biden declares that he is ceasing his campaign for re-election and that he will be stepping down, thus not finishing his current term. These declarations must occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, although he is not required to have officially resigned and vacated his position by that time. A statement of his plan to do so is adequate to resolve this market.

If not, this market will resolve NO on August 1st.

question.title: Will USD be worth >= 145 JPY (yen) at close on August 9th, 2024?
question.body:
[image]

Market resolves according to USD/JPY close listed for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance.

not_P.title: Will USD be worth < 145 JPY (yen) at close on August 9th, 2024?
not_P.body:
[image]

Market resolves according to USD/JPY close listed for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance.

para_P.title: Is the value of USD expected to be at least 145 JPY (yen) by the end of trading on August 9th, 2024?
para_P.body:
[image]

The market will determine based on the USD/JPY closing rate recorded for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (1) Joe Biden announces he is dropping out and resigning before the end of July 2024, and (2) USD is worth >= 145 JPY at close on August 9th, 2024?
question.body:
(1) Resolves YES if Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this component YES. Otherwise, this component resolves NO on August 1st.

(2) Resolves YES if the USD/JPY close listed for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance is greater than or equal to 145. Otherwise, resolves NO.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (1) Joe Biden announces he is dropping out and resigning before the end of July 2024, nor (2) USD is worth >= 145 JPY at close on August 9th, 2024?
not_P.body:
(1) Resolves YES if Joe Biden does not announce both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must not occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time. An announcement of his intention to do so is not sufficient to resolve this component YES. Otherwise, this component resolves NO on August 1st.

(2) Resolves YES if the USD/JPY close listed for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance is less than 145. Otherwise, resolves NO.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will take place: (1) Joe Biden declares his withdrawal and resignation prior to the conclusion of July 2024, and (2) the USD will be valued at 145 JPY or more at the close on August 9, 2024?
para_P.body:
(1) This will be marked as YES if Joe Biden states that he is no longer pursuing re-election and that he will be stepping down, not finishing his current term. These statements must be made before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, although he does not need to have formally left office by that time. A declaration of his plan to do so is adequate for this part to be marked YES. If not, this part will be marked NO on August 1.

(2) This will be marked YES if the USD/JPY closing rate on August 9, 2024, as reported by Yahoo! Finance, is at least 145. If not, it will be marked NO.

question.title: Will either of the following occur by their respective deadlines: (a) Joe Biden announces he is dropping out and resigning or (b) USD is worth >= 145 JPY at close on August 9th, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient. Otherwise, this part resolves NO on August 1st.

(b) Resolves YES if the USD/JPY close listed for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance is greater than or equal to 145 JPY. Otherwise, it resolves NO.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur by their respective deadlines: (a) Joe Biden announces he is dropping out and resigning nor (b) USD is worth < 145 JPY at close on August 9th, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if Joe Biden does not announce both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must not occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time. Otherwise, this part resolves NO on August 1st.

(b) Resolves YES if the USD/JPY close listed for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance is less than 145 JPY. Otherwise, it resolves NO.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following takes place before their specified deadlines: (a) Joe Biden declares his intention to withdraw and resign or (b) the USD reaches a value of at least 145 JPY at the close on August 9th, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This will be considered YES if Joe Biden makes a declaration that he is not seeking re-election and that he will resign, thereby not finishing his current term. Such declarations must be made prior to the conclusion of July 2024 in Pacific Time, although he does not need to have officially stepped down and vacated his position by the end of July. A statement of his plan to do so is adequate. If this does not happen, this part will be marked NO on August 1st.

(b) This will be marked YES if the closing exchange rate for USD/JPY on August 9th, 2024, as reported by Yahoo! Finance, is 145 JPY or more. If not, it will be marked NO.

question.title: Will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
question.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office

not_P.title: Will Biden not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland not to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

para_P.title: Will Biden be recognized as incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August?
para_P.body:
This is affirmed with a YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another pertinent authority) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially declare that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his office" and allows the Vice President to assume the role of Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is irrelevant for this inquiry.

Biden leaving the Presidency due to death, resignation, etc., is not applicable. Biden's invocation of section 3 of the 25th amendment is also not applicable.

Context: A GOP legislator requests Merrick Garland to invoke the 25th Amendment to oust Biden from his position.

question.title: Before July 1, 2024, will the International Criminal Court issue arrest warrants for any of the listed Israeli leaders?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues a [warrant of arrest](https://www.icc-cpi.int/about/how-the-court-works) for any of the below listed Israeli cabinet members. It will resolve as **No** otherwise.

* Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
* Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
* Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

not_P.title: Before July 1, 2024, will the International Criminal Court not issue arrest warrants for any of the listed Israeli leaders?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) does not issue a [warrant of arrest](https://www.icc-cpi.int/about/how-the-court-works) for any of the below listed Israeli cabinet members. It will resolve as **No** otherwise.

* Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
* Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
* Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

para_P.title: Will any of the specified Israeli leaders receive arrest warrants from the International Criminal Court prior to July 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues a [warrant of arrest](https://www.icc-cpi.int/about/how-the-court-works) for any of the Israeli cabinet members listed below before July 1, 2024. It will be answered with **No** if that does not occur.

* Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
* Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
* Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (1) Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024 and (2) the ICC issue arrest warrants for listed Israeli leaders before July 1, 2024?
question.body:
(1) Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question. Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

(2) Resolves YES if before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues a warrant of arrest for any of the below listed Israeli cabinet members. It will resolve as NO otherwise.
* Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
* Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
* Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (1) Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024 nor (2) the ICC issue arrest warrants for listed Israeli leaders before July 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
(1) Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question. Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

(2) Resolves YES if before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues a warrant of arrest for any of the below listed Israeli cabinet members. It will resolve as NO otherwise.
* Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
* Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
* Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

para_P.title: Is it possible that both of these events will take place: (1) Biden is declared unable to fulfill his duties under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August 2024 and (2) the ICC issues arrest warrants for specified Israeli officials before July 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
(1) This will be considered YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate entity) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and appoints the Vice President as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The length of the incapacity is irrelevant to this question. Biden leaving the presidency due to death, resignation, or similar circumstances does not count. Biden's invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also excluded.

(2) This will be marked as YES if, prior to July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues an arrest warrant for any of the listed Israeli cabinet members below. It will be marked as NO otherwise.
* Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
* Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
* Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

question.title: Will either of the following occur before their respective deadlines: (1) Biden is declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4, or (2) the ICC issues arrest warrants for listed Israeli leaders?
question.body:
This question resolves as YES if either of the following occurs:

(a) Before August 2024 (Eastern time), the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that President Biden is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office, causing the Vice President to serve as Acting President. The duration of the incapacity does not matter, and Biden exiting the office by death, resignation, or invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

(b) Before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues a warrant of arrest for any of the following Israeli cabinet members: Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister), Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister), or Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff).

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur before their respective deadlines: (1) Biden is declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4, nor (2) the ICC issues arrest warrants for listed Israeli leaders?
not_P.body:
This question resolves as YES if neither of the following occurs:

(a) Before August 2024 (Eastern time), the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that President Biden is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office, causing the Vice President to serve as Acting President. The duration of the incapacity does not matter, and Biden exiting the office by death, resignation, or invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

(b) Before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues a warrant of arrest for any of the following Israeli cabinet members: Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister), Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister), or Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff).

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that one of the following will take place prior to their deadlines: (1) Biden is officially deemed incapacitated according to Section 4 of the 25th Amendment, or (2) the ICC releases arrest warrants for specified Israeli officials?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered affirmative if one of the subsequent events occurs:

(a) Prior to August 2024 (Eastern time), the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially declare that President Biden is incapable of fulfilling the responsibilities and duties of his position, resulting in the Vice President assuming the role of Acting President. The length of the incapacity is irrelevant, and Biden's departure from office due to death, resignation, or the invocation of section 3 of the 25th amendment does not apply.

(b) Before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues an arrest warrant for any of the following Israeli government officials: Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister), Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister), or Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff).

question.title: Will Nikki Haley be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Nikki Haley is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently listed; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Nikki Haley not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Nikki Haley is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. At least one other candidate must be selected as the nominee to resolve as **Yes**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently listed; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Will Nikki Haley be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be marked as **Yes** if Nikki Haley is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will be marked as **No**. This inquiry is not limited to the candidates currently known; additional options may be introduced later.

For this inquiry, it does not matter who obtains the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is only based on who is chosen by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
question.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office

not_P.title: Will Biden not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and do not cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker does not ask Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

para_P.title: Will Biden be determined to be incapacitated according to Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August?
para_P.body:
This will be considered a YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate body) activates Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to perform the powers and responsibilities of his office" and allows the Vice President to take on the role of Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is irrelevant for this inquiry.

Biden leaving the Presidency due to death, resignation, etc., is not applicable. Biden's own invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment does not count.

Background: A GOP lawmaker has urged Merrick Garland to utilize the 25th Amendment to remove Biden from his position.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Nikki Haley be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and (b) Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met:

1. Nikki Haley is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

2. The Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following not occur: (a) Nikki Haley be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, or (b) Biden not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is met:

1. Nikki Haley is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election.

2. The Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

para_P.title: Is it possible for both of the following to take place: (a) Nikki Haley become the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and (b) Biden be officially recognized as incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August 2024?
para_P.body:
This question will be answered with **Yes** if both of the following criteria are fulfilled:

1. Nikki Haley is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, as determined by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

2. The Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or other applicable authority) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his office" and enable the Vice President to act as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The length of the incapacity is irrelevant for this inquiry.

Biden leaving the Presidency due to death, resignation, etc. is not considered. Biden invoking Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also not considered.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (1) Nikki Haley is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, or (2) Biden is declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (1) Nikki Haley is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election. (2) The Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter, and Biden exiting the office by death, resignation, etc., or invoking Section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (1) Nikki Haley is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, nor (2) Biden is declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (1) Nikki Haley is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election. (2) The Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter, and Biden exiting the office by death, resignation, etc., or invoking Section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following happens: (1) Nikki Haley becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, or (2) Biden is officially deemed incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if at least one of the following takes place: (1) Nikki Haley is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This decision is based on the selection made by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, rather than who is nominated by the Republican party on the day of the 2024 US election. (2) The Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate authority) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to perform the powers and responsibilities of his office" and enable the Vice President to act as President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The length of the incapacity is irrelevant, and Biden leaving office due to death, resignation, etc., or the use of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment does not count.

question.title: Will the domestic box office opening of "Deadpool & Wolverine" be higher than that of "Deadpool" and "The Wolverine" combined?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if the domestic box office opening for the **Deadpool & Wolverine** reported by Boxofficemojo on the [movie's page](https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt6263850/?ref_=bo_se_r_1) is higher than $185,548,391 which is the sum of the box openings for **Deadpool** (2016) and **The Wolverine** (2013): $132,434,639 + $53,113,752.

question.title: Will Iceland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Iceland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If not, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Iceland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Iceland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If so, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Iceland set to make it to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Iceland competes in a Semi-final and is formally declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Otherwise, it will resolve as **No**.

question.title: Will Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Ireland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Ireland set to make it to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Ireland takes part in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Conversely, if Ireland fails to qualify, the outcome will be a **No**.

question.title: Will both Iceland and Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both Iceland and Ireland participate in a Semi-final and are officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either or both do not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will either Iceland or Ireland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either Iceland or Ireland do not participate in a Semi-final or are not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If both qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Are both Iceland and Ireland set to advance to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if both Iceland and Ireland take part in a Semi-final and are officially declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either or both fail to qualify, the inquiry will conclude as **No**.

question.title: Will either Iceland or Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Iceland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Iceland nor Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Iceland nor Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) Iceland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, nor (b) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Iceland or Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will Iceland or Ireland make it to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if one of the following happens: (a) Iceland takes part in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) to have advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Ireland takes part in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) to have advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither country qualifies, the inquiry will be deemed **No**.

question.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democra...nomination for President?
question.body:
Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle.

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

para_P.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden publicly declare before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?
para_P.body:
Will Joe Biden make a public announcement before the date of July 15, 2024, stating that he will decline the Democratic Party's nomination for the presidency?

This will resolve in the same manner as the original question on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This inquiry will be marked as Yes if, before 00:00 Eastern time on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign issues a clear and official public statement indicating that he will not pursue nor accept the nomination from his party for another term as President of the United States in the upcoming 2024 election.

For a Yes resolution, the announcement must be clear-cut and definitive: it must eliminate any possibility that Biden would agree to accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a conclusive statement is not made before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will be resolved as No.

Further details and background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original question is resolved, its outcome will automatically apply to this market. Users deemed trustworthy are encouraged to resolve this market early if the outcome is known and clear. You may contact @jskf to request an early resolution or to report any issues.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President (b) Chris Christie is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

This resolves as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a statement is not made by this deadline, this resolves as No.

(b) Will Chris Christie be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?

This resolves as Yes if Chris Christie is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. It is determined solely by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not by who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following not occur: (a) Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President (b) Chris Christie is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden not announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

This resolves as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign does not make a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a statement is made by this deadline, this resolves as No.

(b) Will Chris Christie not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?

This resolves as Yes if Chris Christie is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. It is determined solely by who is not selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not by who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election.

para_P.title: Are both of the following events going to take place: (a) Joe Biden declares before July 15, 2024 that he will not pursue the Democratic nomination for President (b) Chris Christie becomes the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
(a) Is it true that Joe Biden will declare before July 15, 2024 that he will not pursue the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

This will be considered Yes if by 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a clear, public, official statement that he will not seek or accept the nomination from his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. The announcement must be clear and definitive, with no ambiguity regarding Biden's acceptance of the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 election cycle. If such a declaration is not made by this deadline, the resolution will be No.

(b) Is Chris Christie going to be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?

This will be considered Yes if Chris Christie is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. The determination is based solely on the selection made by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not on who is announced as the Republican nominee on the day of the 2024 US election.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President, or (b) Chris Christie is selected as the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President? This resolves as Yes if, prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive.

(b) Will Chris Christie be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election? This resolves as Yes if Chris Christie is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, regardless of who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the election.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President, nor (b) Chris Christie is selected as the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden not announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President? This resolves as Yes if, prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign does not make a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive.

(b) Will Chris Christie not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election? This resolves as Yes if Chris Christie is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, regardless of who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the election.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following will take place: (a) Joe Biden publicly declares prior to July 15, 2024, that he will not pursue the Democratic nomination for President, or (b) Chris Christie is chosen as the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
(a) Is it true that Joe Biden will publicly announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President? This will be considered Yes if, before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a clear and official statement indicating that he will not seek or accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. The announcement must be clear and definitive.

(b) Will Chris Christie be the chosen candidate for the Republican Party in the 2024 US Presidential Election? This will resolve as Yes if Chris Christie is nominated by the Republican National Convention for the 2024 US Presidential Election, irrespective of who is declared the Republican nominee on election day.

question.title: Will Joe Biden announce that he is both dropping out and resigning from the presidency before the end of July?
question.body:
Resolves YES if Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this market.

Otherwise, this market resolves NO on August 1st.

not_P.title: Will Joe Biden not announce that he is either dropping out or resigning from the presidency before the end of July?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if Joe Biden does not announce either that he is no longer running for re-election or that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must not occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time. An announcement of his intention to do neither is sufficient to resolve this market.

Otherwise, this market resolves NO on August 1st.

para_P.title: Will Joe Biden declare his intention to withdraw from the presidential race and step down from office prior to July's conclusion?
para_P.body:
This will be considered a YES if Joe Biden makes a statement indicating that he is ceasing his campaign for re-election and that he plans to resign from his current position, with these declarations occurring before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time. It is not necessary for him to have officially resigned and vacated his position by the end of July; a declaration of his intent to do so is adequate for this market to resolve positively.

If these announcements do not occur, the market will resolve as NO on August 1st.

question.title: Will Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body: The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

not_P.title: Will Donald Trump not be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
not_P.body: The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is not charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must not occur before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Donald Trump will face charges for witness tampering in Georgia prior to June 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This question will resolve to **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted concerning any remarks made about potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announce that he is both dropping out and resigning from the presidency before the end of July 2024, and (b) Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this component.

Otherwise, this component resolves NO on August 1st.

(b) Resolves YES if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

The overall question resolves YES only if both (a) and (b) resolve YES.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announce that he is both dropping out and resigning from the presidency before the end of July 2024, nor (b) Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if Joe Biden does not announce both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must not occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time.

Otherwise, this component resolves NO on August 1st.

(b) Resolves YES if Donald Trump is not charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must not occur before June 1, 2024.

The overall question resolves YES only if neither (a) nor (b) resolve YES.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will happen: (a) Joe Biden will declare that he is both stepping down and resigning from the presidency prior to the end of July 2024, and (b) Donald Trump will face charges for witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This part resolves to YES if Joe Biden makes an announcement stating that he is withdrawing from the race for re-election and that he will resign, thus not completing his current presidential term. Such announcements need to take place before the conclusion of July 2024 in Pacific Time, and while he does not need to have officially resigned and vacated office by then, expressing his intent to do so suffices for a YES resolution on this component.

If this does not occur, it will resolve to NO on August 1st.

(b) This part resolves to YES if Donald Trump is charged or indicted regarding any remarks made about potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. These charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

The overall question will only resolve to YES if both (a) and (b) are confirmed as YES.

question.title: Will either of the following occur before their respective deadlines: (1) Joe Biden announces both dropping out and resigning from the presidency, or (2) Donald Trump is charged with witness tampering in Georgia?
question.body:
This question resolves YES if either of the following occurs: 

1. Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must be made before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient.

2. Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

If neither of these events occurs by their respective deadlines, this question resolves NO.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur before their respective deadlines: (1) Joe Biden announces both dropping out and resigning from the presidency, or (2) Donald Trump is charged with witness tampering in Georgia?
not_P.body:
This question resolves YES if neither of the following occurs: 

1. Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must be made before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient.

2. Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

If either of these events occurs by their respective deadlines, this question resolves NO.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following happens prior to their deadlines: (1) Joe Biden declares both his withdrawal from the presidential race and his resignation from the presidency, or (2) Donald Trump faces charges for witness tampering in Georgia?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered YES if at least one of the following takes place: 

1. Joe Biden makes an announcement stating that he will not be seeking re-election and that he intends to resign, thereby not finishing his current term. These statements must be made before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, although he does not need to have officially resigned and vacated his position by that time. A declaration of his intention to do so is adequate.

2. Donald Trump is charged or indicted concerning any remarks related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

If neither of these scenarios occurs by their respective deadlines, the answer to this question will be NO.

question.title: Kamala president by Friday?
question.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

not_P.title: Kamala not president by Friday?
not_P.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is not formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

para_P.title: Will Kamala Harris be President by Friday?

This market will conclude with a "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time prior to July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. If this does not occur, the market will result in a "No".
